server.commands.move.devcard

Class PlayMonopoly_Command

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.commands.move.devcard.PlayMonopoly_Command
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Command

    public class PlayMonopoly_Command
extends java.lang.Object
implements Command
    Concrete command implementing the Command interface. Issues the Play Monopoly Dev Card action on the server facade.
    Author:
    Dallin

        public void execute()
        Issues the Play Monopoly Dev Card action on the given game server game model. Should only be triggered by the games models Command History class.

        public void setGame(IServerFacade facade)
